n2e/classification-distribution-route.title: Classify names, predicting entire distribution.
n2e/classification-distribution-route.description: Classifying names using this endpoint will return the predicted confidence for each ethnicity.

n2e/classification-route.title: Classify names.
n2e/classification-route.description: Classifying names using this endpoint will return the predicted confidence for the most likely ethnicity.

n2e/get-default-models-route.title: Get all default models.
n2e/get-default-models-route.description: Using this endpoint you can receive all models that N2E provides by default.

n2e/get-models-route.title: Get all models.
n2e/get-models-route.description: Using this endpoint you can receive all your custom and N2Es default models.

n2e/get-nationalities-route.title: Get nationalities.
n2e/get-nationalities-route.description: Returns a list of all available nationalities (49) and nationality groups (8) along with the amount of samples we have of them in our dataset.

n2e/name-to-ethnicity-api.title: Name-to-ethnicity API
n2e/name-to-ethnicity-api.description: This is the official REST API documentation for www.name-to-ethnicity.com. Using our public API you can classify names into their most likely ethnicity and retrieve a list of all your models.
